title: Fantastic ...
description: Fantastic Game. Fantastic Story. Super Immersive. I love games that make you make tough decisions.

title: The first ...
description: The first time I played this game, I didnt get that much into it, but after the 2nd play I started to get whats the big fuss about this game.You are technically forging the history! all based on tactics and bluffing your opponent.The negative thing about this game is that, if you aren't an experienced player you will get wiped by a professional player! which means this game got a lot of depth into it.

title: Good game....
description: Good game. Top of the heap? Nah...

title: Deluxe Edi...
description: Deluxe Edition 2009 (GMT P500).Simply brilliant! Deceptively simple CDG with deep gameplay and loads of tension. My favorite game along with Through the Ages.Only drawback is the *really long* playtime, and difficulty finding f2f opponents.

title: Awesome ga...
description: Awesome game.  Have played many times using ACTS, only twice live.  Fun either way, and I wish I had more time to play it.

title: Oh so love...
description: Oh so lovely tension that this game has. Will quite probably rise to another 10 if I get some more games under my belt.* So it went to 10 and then came back down again. The gameplay is superb, tension is good. Everything seems to be there, but somehow I don't want to play it. No idea why is that.

title: The large ...
description: The large hand of cards feels combersome as a newbie. Maybe if you're willing to take the dive or learn with a partner.

title: Brilliant ...
description:
Brilliant wargame for non-wargamers and wargamers alike. Theme is marvelous and well-integrated into the game, and the game is a blast. 
The game is not without problems, though. 1) It is imbalanced (heavily in favour of the Soviets); 2) There is a large experience factor in the game (know the deck and prosper); 3) It's really quite random. All of that having been said, TS is still brilliant.

title: Awesome ga...
description: Awesome game.  Very tense, with lots of tough choices to make.

title: As CDGs go...
description: As CDGs go, this is incredible. For anyone to turn "The Cold War" into anything this tension-filled and interesting is an achievement. This reminds me of Hannibal: Rome vs. Carthage, but with much more going on, much of it quite subtle -- yet satisfying.

title: A complete...
description: A completely filled with theme area control game. It is NOT a wargame!
